briefTitle: Survey Conducted Among Early Breast Cancer Patients Treated With Arimidex for Evaluation of Treatment Adherence
officialTitle: Survey and Follow-up of the Treatment Adherence and Medication Habits of Early Breast Cancer Patients on Adjuvant Hormonal Therapy With the Aromatase Inhibitor Arimidex
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Percent of patients remaining adherent to therapy with Arimidex
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Early breast cancer
* Post menopausal
* Adjuvant hormonal Arimidex therapy
